name: Dodge Heros
description:
Get ready to Dodge! Swipe away to avoid the spikes.

How far up can you get? The blades are not happy, and don't want to let you pass. Dodge the spikes to move up and score more points.

Collect coins on your way up to unlock all the characters. Just be careful to avoid the saws at all costs

Features:
- Addictive game play
- 30 Characters to unlock
- Customisation
- Leader boards & Achievements
+ much more
